title: Ethereum Cat Herders Meeting #121
body:
## Date and Time

Nov 07, 2023 at **15:00 UTC** [Please note the change of meeting time]

## Location 

Join Zoom Meeting
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09
Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A


## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 0. [Ecosystem Project Demo] 

### 1. Ethereum network upgrades
- [Cancun](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/cancun.md) & [Deneb](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/tree/dev/specs/deneb) upgrade
- [Dencun Interop Testing Call 34](https://youtu.be/C8757wvksr0)

####  Useful resources
- Changes included in the Network Upgrade - [Dencun](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/dencun/)
- Dencun upgrade [PEEPanEIP Playlist](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxpnKFDl1KzGOKqwux5JaLlv)
   - [PEEPanEIP: Dencun Testing with Parithosh, Mario, Barnabas ](https://youtu.be/88tZticGbTo)
   - [PEEPanEIP: Keeping up with #Deneb Specification with Gajinder Singh ](https://youtu.be/W_A6qfvOrhw)   
   - [PEEPanEIP-1153: Transient storage opcodes with Moody Salem](https://youtu.be/9YMEYTzzKtI)
   - [PEEPanEIP-4844: Shard Blob Transactions with Terence ](https://youtu.be/4lyb02wZQQ4)
   - [PEEPanEIP-7044: Perpetually Valid Signed Voluntary Exits with dappLion ](https://youtu.be/g47MOV8ETB8)
   - [PEEPanEIP-7045: Increase max attestation inclusion slot with Danny Ryan ](https://youtu.be/Z4tMgrreCN8)
   - [PEEPanEIP-6780: SELFDESTRUCT only in same transaction ](https://youtu.be/s7fm6Zz_G0I)
   - [PEEPanEIP-4788: Beacon block root in the EVM](https://youtu.be/GriLSj37RdI)
   - [PEEPanEIP-5656: MCOPY - Memory copying instruction](https://youtu.be/m_YzKuL2VxM)
   - [PEEPanEIP-7514: Add max epoch activation churn limit](https://youtu.be/URQZVqgKZI4)
   - [PEEPanEIP-7516: BLOBBASEFEE opcode](https://youtu.be/VUita9Yl9gY)

### 2. Other Protocol Development & Research
  - [Roll call 0 ](https://youtu.be/aPvMoVI6rFE)
    - [Ansgar inviting Layer2 devs for RollCall](https://youtu.be/fezITtco2JU)
  - EOF Implementers [Meeting 26]

### 3. Events, Fellowship, Hackathon
- [EthIndia](https://ethindia.co/) - 8-10 Dec, 2023
- [ERC @ Devconnect](https://hackmd.io/@xinbenlv/erc-devconnect2023)
- [Devconnect - Istanbul](https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/04/20/announcing-devconnect-ist) - November 13-19, 2023.

### 4. New initiative/association/team discussion
- Chinese Subtitle of PEEP videos - Holesky
- [Ecosystem Project Demo](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxrhbMXuCqMsCiwx1lwu_cNs) 
  - [Ep 6 - Gelato Network](https://youtu.be/c9XIDWbop6U)
- [Meet The Herders](https://hackmd.io/@hgedia/B1D3uPhAh) 
  - [Ep 1 - Pooja Ranjan](https://youtu.be/XCOdX5UmtU4)
- Any new ideas for community engagement?

### 5. General updates/discussion
- ECH Stats.
    - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/EthCatHerders) - 6750 Followers
    - [Discord](https://discord.io/EthCatHerders) - 2215 users
    - [YouTube](https://studio.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A) - 3229 subscribers
    - [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/ethereum-cat-herders/) - 300 Followers
- ECH engineering
  - Learn2Earn (Dencun)
     - NFT Design - Open bounty
     - Questions (20-25) - Open bounty
  - [ECH Website](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/) 
    - [Dencun](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/dencun)    
    - [ ] A page for [Ethereum Public Testnets](https://www.figma.com/file/uXsNK9RsQs9xtT71LKsGL0/Ethereum-Cat-Herders?type=design&node-id=133-4&mode=design)
- ECH Operations 
   - [Tweets from EthCatHerders](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Nqxy7lLJ5gS3DGapIdlqfWKGiyyK84ey9JhurcuONrg/edit#gid=0)
   - [YouTube Shorts](https://studio.youtube.com/playlist/PL4cwHXAawZxr020waJCI0dZAfPAW2naK1/videos)
     - PEEPanEIP shorts [Community Playlist](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxr020waJCI0dZAfPAW2naK1)
   - [ECH Podcast](https://open.spotify.com/show/7dgxKMkSyy3HWtQW7OfqXA)
- [EIPs Insight](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight) & [EIPsInsight website](https://eipsinsight.com/insight/2023/10) 
- [PEEPanEIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F)  
    - Upcoming meetings can be found on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)
- ECH Funding
  - [ ] Octant - [Epoch 1](https://octant.app/#/projects)
  - [ ] DRIPs
  - [ ] OP - [RPGF](https://vote.optimism.io/retropgf/3/application/0xe7f1ebfe8e8c9980ba192a76b77e18f747e82d642f985681748615457c0e8b7c)
  - [ ] Giveth
  - [ ] CLR
  - [ ] Gitcoin Grant
- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 
  - All Core Dev Execution [Notes 173](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/896)
  - All Core Dev Consensus [Notes 121](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/899)
  - EIPIP [meeting 93]
  - EIP Editing Office Hour Meeting [Agenda 27](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/290), [Recording Meeting 26](https://youtu.be/EuYXQMmnxKs)
### 6. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- Meeting [120](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/pull/377)

## The date for the next meeting is Nov 21, 2023 at 15:00 UTC

 (If anything else, leave a comment.)
